#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
#define CLR(a,val) memset(a, val, sizeof(a))
#define SZ(V) (LL)V.size()
#define ALL(V) V.begin(),V.end()
#define RALL(V) V.rbegin(),V.rend()
#define FORN(i, n) for(LL i = 0; i < n; i++)
#define FORAB(i, a, b) for(LL i = a; i <= b; i++)
#define MOD 1000000007LL
#define PB push_back
#define MP make_pair
#define F first
#define S second

typedef long long LL;
typedef pair<LL,LL> pll;


vector<int> v[20004];
LL p[20004];
void dfs(LL index,LL prev){
	if(p[index]!=-2) return;
	p[index]=prev;
	FORN(i,SZ(v[index])) dfs(v[index][i],index);
	return;
}
int main()
{
	LL test;
	cin >> test;
	while(test--){
		LL n,h1,h2;
		cin >> n >> h1 >> h2;
		h1--;h2--;
		FORN(i,n){
			if(i==h1)continue;
			LL x;
			cin >> x;
			x--;
			v[x].PB(i);
			v[i].PB(x);
		}
		FORN(i,n) p[i]=-2;
		dfs(h2,-1);
		FORN(i,n) if(p[i]!=-1) cout << p[i]+1 << " "; cout << endl;
		FORN(i,n) v[i].clear();
	}
	return 0;
}
